body_html:
@gouwsmeister Sure. With my fix, the output on the same example will be:

Sample data [5234, 3081, 12, 6, 195, 2, 3135, 46, 59, 156] ['anarchism', 'originated', 'as', 'a', 'term', 'of', 'abuse', 'first', 'used', 'against']
3081 originated -> 5234 anarchism
3081 originated -> 12 as
12 as -> 6 a
12 as -> 3081 originated
----------------------------------------
6 a -> 195 term
6 a -> 12 as
195 term -> 2 of
195 term -> 6 a

Now all possible pairs are recalled, and words at the end of a batch (term, for instance) will appear in the next batch.

body:
@gouwsmeister Sure. With my fix, the output on the same example will be:
```
Sample data [5234, 3081, 12, 6, 195, 2, 3135, 46, 59, 156] ['anarchism', 'originated', 'as', 'a', 'term', 'of', 'abuse', 'first', 'used', 'against']
3081 originated -> 5234 anarchism
3081 originated -> 12 as
12 as -> 6 a
12 as -> 3081 originated
----------------------------------------
6 a -> 195 term
6 a -> 12 as
195 term -> 2 of
195 term -> 6 a
```
Now all possible pairs are recalled, and words at the end of a batch (`term`, for instance) will appear in the next batch.
